UCSF研究人员使瘫痪的人能够用大脑信号控制机器人臂加州大学旧金山分校的研究人员使一个人瘫痪了通过将他的大脑信号传递到计算机的设备控制机器人手臂。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250307/ucsf-researchers-enable-paralyzed-man-man-man-to-control-robotic-arbotic-arm-arm-with-brain-brain-signals.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250307/ucsf-researchers-enable-paralyzed-man-man-to-control-robototic-arbototic-arm-robotic-arm-with-brain-brain-signals.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=0E676647-1BBF-4D5B-A8E8-B54BA52A8DB4 Fri, 07 Mar 2025 07:31:35 -0500 UCSF researchers enable paralyzed man to control robotic arm with brain signals
马蒂·马克里（Marty Makary）通常是大流行评论家，他准备带领他反对的FDA去年秋天，小组成员被要求表达他们的遗憾 - 他们在大流行期间支持的政策，但被认为是误导的。 Covid接触跟踪，一个人说。另一个关闭学校说。疫苗规定，三分之一说。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250307/marty-marty-makary-often-wrong-as-as-pandemic-critic-critic-is-poine-poine-poine po- to-to-lead-the-the-fda-he-railed-railed-railed-against.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250307/marty-marty-makary-often-wrong-as-pandemic-critic-critic-is-poised-to-lead-to-lead-the-the-the-fda-he-ard-he-ard--he-arc.-against.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=9E8C3E51-EFD0-45F5-8595-4B8003D83065 Fri, 07 Mar 2025 06:47:16 -0500 Marty Makary, often wrong as pandemic critic, is poised to lead the FDA he railed against
医疗补助倡导者说，批评家使用加载的术语来获得国会辩论的优势在华盛顿关于为医疗补助筹集大笔资金的辩论中，言语是一个中央战场。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250307/medicaid-advocates-say-critics-critics-use-loaded-terms-to-to-to-1------------------- https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250307/medicaid-advocates-say-critics-critics-use-loaded-terms-to---------------------------------------- https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=439ecd6a-85c2-4d92-a53e-66fd2d2dcc47d0 Fri, 07 Mar 2025 06:41:21 -0500 Medicaid advocates say critics use loaded terms to gain edge in Congressional debate
基于音乐的疗法可能使痴呆症患者受益一项新的Cochrane评论发现，基于音乐的疗法可能使患有痴呆症患者有益，特别是通过改善抑郁症状。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250307/music-base--therapy-may-benefit-people-people-people-living-with-dementia.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250307/music-base--therapy-may-benefit-people-people-people-living-with-dementia.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=bd5a01f5-b92b-4d1E-4D1E-AF5A-183F4C230148 Fri, 07 Mar 2025 06:32:00 -0500 Music-based therapy may benefit people living with dementia
研究问题医师同事在初级保健和麻醉角色中的有效性研究人员说，他们找不到令人信服的证据，表明医生同事在英国初级保健中增加价值，或者麻醉伴侣在麻醉剂中增加价值，并且一些证据表明他们没有。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250307/study-questions-questions-effectimens-effectives-of-physician-sassician-sassician-rassician-rassician-rimary-care-care and-care and-manesthethetic-asspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250307/study-questions-questions-effectives-of-physician-sassician-sassician-sassician-rimary-care and-parmary-care and-andesthethetic-comment.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=3b58f3d5-0234-40e1-b167-9041faa6d269 Fri, 07 Mar 2025 06:24:07 -0500 Study questions effectiveness of physician associates in primary care and anesthetic roles
在线反应时间测试提供了对女性认知健康的见解妇女反应时间的在线测试提供了对认知功能的见解，并可能有助于填补早期认知问题的数据差距，有可能阐明生命后期的痴呆症发展，发现由UCL和其他大学的研究人员领导的一项新研究。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250307/online-reaction time-tests-provide-ingights-into-womens-womens-cognitive-health.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250307/online-reaction time-tests-provide-ingights-into-womens-womens-cognitive-health.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=64a9557f-e782-48e2-87e2-18362df31be1 Fri, 07 Mar 2025 06:11:26 -0500 Online reaction time tests provide insights into women's cognitive health
NIH计划集中赠款的同行审查流程今天，美国国立卫生研究院宣布计划将同行审查集中在该机构科学审查中心（CSR）内的所有赠款，合作协议以及研发合同的申请中。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250307/nih-plans-plans-to-centralize-peer-review-process-process-for-for-grants.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250307/nih-plans-to-centralize-peer-peer-review-process-process-for-for-grants.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=09348d2a-425f-4029-4029-8A9B-63A312F21F4E Fri, 07 Mar 2025 05:57:34 -0500 NIH plans to centralize peer review process for grants
研究强调了Covid-19大流行对学生绩效的长期影响众所周知，共同19-19大流行对学生绩效的影响是众所周知的，但是大流行后的四年，大学课程的分数并未恢复到大流行前的水平。密西西比大学的一项研究可能会指出一个答案。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250307/study-highlights-the-long-term-term-term-term-covid-19-19----------- performance-performance.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250307/study-highlights-the-long--term-term-term-covid-covid-19---------- performance.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=A088Bede-74C7-4375-BE6F-511F-511F3B1148CF Fri, 07 Mar 2025 05:43:42 -0500 Study highlights the long-term impact of COVID-19 pandemic on student performance
发表的新临床研究：astaxanthin降低了儿童的数字眼睛菌株一项新的研究表明，补充astaxanthin可以改善儿童的急性和慢性数字眼菌株。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250307/new-clinical-study-publishin-publishin-astaxanthin-reduces-digital-eye-eye-strain-in-children.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250307/new-clinical-study-publish--publishin--astaxanthin-reduces-digital-eye-eye-strain-in-children.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=8B5D023E-FB21-4224-9960-370C9BB4147D Fri, 07 Mar 2025 05:14:00 -0500 New clinical study published: Astaxanthin reduces digital eye strain in children
AI增强医生：新技术如何改变患者护理，切割错误并释放NHS NHS和英国的医生将受益于开创性的人工智能技术，旨在改变医生与患者互动，减少医疗错误，减少行政负担以及进行数千次其他约会。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250307/ai-enhanced-doctors-how-new-new-technology-is-is-transforming-patient-patient-cutting-cutting-cutting-errors and freeerrors and freeEfering-nhs.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250307/ai-enhanced-doctors-how-new-new-technology-is-is-ransansforming-patient-patient-cutting-cutting-cutting-coutting-rerors-enderors-enderors-enderors-nhs.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=7c55a3b7-4b96-4806-4806-93f9-3803b32c6d2d Fri, 07 Mar 2025 04:20:00 -0500 AI-enhanced doctors: How new technology is transforming patient care, cutting errors, and freeing up NHS
